entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasi] Failing test `System.Globalization.Tests.CalendarTests.TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing` #82965
    8.0.0
  • Profile Synthesis Work Items #82964
    8.0.0
  • Trim warning suppressions are not correctly propagated in multi-level compiler generated methods #82956
  • TarWriter on Windows Server treats File Deduplication reparse point flag as symbolic links #82949
  • Jiterpreter performance issues around Dictionary and GenericEqualityComparer #82948
  • Loops aren't clonned for Spans #82946
  • Alpine System.Net.Security.Tests failing because of "Cannot load library libgssapi_krb5.so.2" #82945
    8.0.0
  • Not sure, but it seems that timeBeginPeriod affects Task.Delay now? #82944
    8.0.0
  • HttpResponseHeaders.Location can throw InvalidCastException #82943
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #82939
  • [mono][aot] Optimize stack unwind data for exception handling #82938
    Future
  • Add `StringBuilder.Replace` overloads that take `StringComparison` and `CultureInfo` #82937
  • [mono][aot] Enable LLVM interprocedural optimizations #82936
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfNegativeOrGreaterThanOrEqual #82930
  • use filestream write data to linux drive file err #82928
  • Configuration of UseCookies via ConfigurePrimaryHttpMessageHandler for Typed Http Clients is ignored #82932

Closed

  • `CommandLineToArgvW` has different behavior than `SegmentCommandLine` #77644
    8.0.0
  • .NET Logging causing significant slowdown in Unreal 5 build pipeline #82951
  • [wasm] Debugger tests build broken on `main` #82962
  • Useless GC.SuppressFinalize() calls #82959
  • Code in CoreLib defeating resource string optimization #82759
    8.0.0
  • Process.WaitForExit() hangs forever even though the process has exited in some cases #29232
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow custom converters to get their type's JsonTypeInfos #82922
  • [API Proposal]: Add Task.Run overload that avoids capturing the ExecutionContext #80000
  • [release/6.0] CI failure in JIT.Math tests run in Browser: NugetSdkResolver failed while attempting to resolve Microsoft.Build.NoTargets/1.0.53 #78183
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\DictionaryExpansion\\DictionaryExpansion\\DictionaryExpansion.cmd #75244
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] ReservedFrameType_Throws test fails #81944
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Csp.Tests.WorkItemExecution fails on macos with SIGSEGV #79297
  • [API Proposal]: Add ECDiffieHellman.DeriveSecretAgreement method #71613
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json deserialized readonly struct wrong #82929
  • Dispose not called on exception on linux-arm runtime #82941
  • [browser] don't publish native DLLs #82888
    8.0.0
  • Assembly loaded a second time in default host context by RuntimeAssembly.GetExportedTypes #82856
  • Cannot instantiate nullable class with Activator. Is it a bug? #82835
  • Net7 : System.MissingMethodException: Constructor on type '' not found. #82824
  • "Invalid argument" exception when setting Socket.ReceiveTimeout on macOS ARM64 #81378
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Copy WasmFilesToIncludeInFileSystem to the bundle too #82966
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Use libc directly for math in the jiterpreter, implement more opcodes #82963
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • JIT: Assume allocations succeed #82961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds a test for compiler generated trim warning suppression issue #82957
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [browser] new EmccAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Lowering Vector512.Load* for avx512 #82953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • update alpine test images #82931
  • Allow devirtualizing more interface calls #82927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: initial implementation of profile synthesis #82926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trim some overheads for "r"/"o" DateTime parsing #82925
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Implement managed SegmentCommandLine #82883
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix trim warning in ComponentActivator #82952
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Debugger tests - fix build #82958
    arch-wasm, blocking-clean-ci, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: fix fgDfsReversePostorder #82950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix patterns that defeat resource string optimizations in CoreLib #82947
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix min/max in the jiterpreter #82955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • use PlatformSpecific attribute to supress platform specific Quic tests #82933
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic
  • add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82284
    area-Meta
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - native #82834
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Allow default AsyncFlowControls rather than throwing #82912
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement more jiterpreter opcodes #82940
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Guard more COM interop related code #82882
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotation fixes #82803
    area-Meta
  • Remove cached RW mapping when the corresponding RX one is released #82841
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix typo in SingleEntry.targets property #82935
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support raw ECDH key agreements #82551
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Calculate hash for runtime assets #82891
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable runtime tests running on arm64 with mini JIT #82814
  • [jiterp] Perform a single unsigned bounds check for array accesses #82919
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #82413
  • Implement interfaces in the non-generic enumerator base #82923
  • Fix a few async void tests to be async Task #82914
  • Revert "Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2" #82881
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Improve DateTime.ParseExact perf for invariant culture #82877
    area-System.Globalization, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Substitute out geopolitical term in TimeZoneInfo #82916
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add RID for Fedora 39 #82185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable JitDasmWithAlignmentBoundaries and JitDasmWithAddress in Release #82666
  • Fix special sweep issue for workstation #81248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IPAddress ISpanFormattable/Parsable implementations #82913
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Make area-owners.json true source for all area like labels dependencies #82534
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • [wasi] More cross compiler fixes. #82911
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation for MONO_PATCH_INFO_METHOD #82711
    blocked, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Port #82470 (disable EventPipe stack collection with environment variable) to 7.0 #82921
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Implement correct handling of new constraint in ilc #82818
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #82810
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    area-Infrastructure
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Does native AOT work for winforms in the future like .net 8 ? #2221
  • [Windows Forms] Controls support #1100
  • Activator.CreateInstance broken (?) #1373
  • [NativeAOT] Question - Windows Forms without reflection #1773

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Spill GC temps live across safe points #2222

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass structs by reference in accordance with the WASM C ABI #2220

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet list return code changed #30975
  • [NETSDKE2E]It's better to not show prompt message "workload update are available..." when building console project. #30969

Closed

  • After installing .NET 8.0 Preview 2, Create a 7.0/6.0 Blazor WebAssembly app with a warning and error: "Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.browser-wasm with version (= 7.0.4)..." #30949

PullRequests

Created

  • add <OS><ARCH> argument help name #30985
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30983
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests for the operation(install/uninstall/update package) when global settings file is corrupted #30970
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused razor dependency #30964
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Pass additional arguments through when Hot Reload is enabled #30866
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30955
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates
  • Fix passing --interactive flag to nuget #30806
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2127333 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #30963
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Display class locals "shadow" regular locals and parameters in EE #67177
  • [Suggestion] Indent Options - Make Open and Close Braces Options Independent (esp. C#) #67170
    Backlog
  • Add partial classes view in margin menu #67169
  • Call Hierarchy should show method group references. #67168
  • Features packages have not been published for 4.5 #67166

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33503.187 #67176
  • MSRC support for 74331 and 74087 #64982
    17.5
  • Incremental generator not being run incrementally for selected primitive value #67160
  • "Go to Base" context menu doesn't work on a constrcutor #44944
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add azdo marker test #67174
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix failure to expose IsExternalInit in net6.0 binaries #67171
    Area-Compilers
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Execute symbol start analyzers concurrently - Approach #2 #67165
    Area-Analyzers
  • Keep runtime version in sync with VS #67164
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add azdo marker for bootstrap failure message #67172
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Insert release/dev17.6 to VS rel/d17.6 #67173
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix crash of type snippets after accessibility modifier #67055
    Community, Next
  • Multitarget O# external access projects to fix issues accessing prope… #67163
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Prevent LegacyGlobalOptionService from GC rooting PreviewWorkspace #67142
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Show preview window for sync namespace #67147
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support 'go to base' on a constructor symbol #67146
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Hoist address-of operators across await boundaries #66915
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Save full state in nullable walker when visiting conditional operand #67157
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • How to troubleshoot a build-time regression #67161
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] WASM GC #47031
  • Have an option for a new Razor Component item template to automatically create a code-behind (.cs) file #47030
    Backlog
  • Consider setting InvariantGlobalization in api template #47029
  • [Blazor] General API review for Blazor United #47028
  • Sanitize 0x7F for content disposition header value #47027
  • [Blazor United] Implement endpoint data source updates #47026
  • [Blazor] ComponentStatePersistenceManager needs to ensure the app has finished rendering #47025
  • App without a default CORS policy doesn't apply custom CORS policies #47022
  • Exceptions should be the recommended way of causing HTTP error codes #47020
  • LocalStorage reading on AuthenticationStateProvider causes infinite redirection loop #47019
  • Blazor component rendering as a library #47018
    8.0-preview3
  • Based on cell value changing color #47015
  • Heartbeat.TimerLoop is consuming 5% of CPU usage in Thread.Sleep #47014

Closed

  • Support serializing polymorphic response types with STJ in RequestDelegateGenerator #46297
    8.0-preview3
  • IWebHostBuilder.Build fails with System.InvalidOperationException: 'A public method named 'ConfigureAutomatedTesting' or 'Configure' could not be found in the 'Program' type.' #46611
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on feature interfaces #46823
    8.0-preview3
  • Expose the cipher suite and SslStream #46442
    8.0-preview2
  • Deserialization error using [JsonPolymorphic] and [JsonDerivedType] attributes (WEBAPI) #46719
  • @onkeydown:preventDefault doesn't work since SDK .NET 7.0.200 #47016
  • [Blazor] Provide a primitive inside Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web for rendering output to HTML #46682
    8.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Razor Component action result #47023
    area-mvc
  • Set up TryParse blocks for explicit header parameters. #47017
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [RDG] Support serializing polymorphic response types with STJ #46791
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove extra English installer files #46951
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 8.0-preview3
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46824
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Use EndpointFilterInvocationContext.Create in RDG source #47005
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Correct a few nullable annotations #46911
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3d787f5` to `cead3d5` #47024
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Backport QuickGrid to preview 2 #46975
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview2
  • SSR as library #46935
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Update TryParse code gen to use CodeWriter. #46928
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Add explicit reference to `Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces` in HealthChecks #46920
    8.0-preview3
  • Move route or query resolution to startup #46972
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview3
  • Call Yarn Install a second time if first one fails #46965
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Expose the original status code in StatusCodeReExecuteFeature #46539
    area-runtime
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #47003
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2127271 #46963
    area-mvc
  • Blazor united initial startup apis for registering pages #46996
    area-blazor
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46750
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46752
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • Remove some Linq usages from Kestrel.Core #47012
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.x
  • Remove some Linq usages from Routing #47004
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46843
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having Windows app run as admin & unpackaged does not work. #13690
  • Shadow does not work as expected on Android vs Windows #13688
  • [Android] Fullscreen not filling space when hiding Navigation. #13685
  • ImageSource class OnLoadingStarted and OnLoadingCompleted method signature changed from protected to protectedprivate #13684
  • IsVisible extension in IView #13678
  • Resources type or namespace does not exist #13677
  • Unable to build in Release #13676
  • Library projects targeting net6.0 and UseMaui set to true VSMac project UI properties doesn't work #13674
  • RadioButton - Color not changing #13670
  • ContentPage.OnAppearing is not getting called when going back from Content page of type Modal page #13668
  • XamlC error XFC0000 : Cannot resolve type "ContentPage".    #13666
  • Cannot select or copy text in read-only editors. #13665

Closed

  • The margin between the mark and content of the radio button is too narrow. #8291
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Button border not displaying on non-windows platforms if BorderWidth is not defined #13612
    Backlog
  • I have "Cycles detected in layout" exceptions all over my app. How can I debug the .NET MAUI source code? #13444
  • Radio button loses initial 'IsChecked=True' value when another radio button also has 'IsChecked=True' #11418
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS Email composing crashes App #12010
    Backlog
  • Disabled Button Visual State doesn't Update Image Source #10709
    .NET 8 Planning
  • iOS Release builds stopped working after last update #12519
  • iOS app poorly responsive when many elements, nested deeply, are on the screen #12592
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Deleting recipe causes nav bar change #3150
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager #13689
    backport/suggested
  • We no longer need to reference BuildTools #13687
  • Reenable tests for iOS, as this should work now #13686
  • [CI] Move the templates jobs to a yml template to be reusable. #13682
  • Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView

Merged

  • [Windows] Add helper method to get GetFirstChildOfType with null support. #13421
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [RadioButton] Fix Issue with BorderWidth, Incorrect spacing in Default Control Template. #13407
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [templates] Add BorderWidth to button style #13629
    area/templates 📄, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [net7.0] Fix reliability of RemoveLastPage test #13679
  • Set a GroupName when creating new WinUI RadioButtons #13611
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #13392
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Backport yaml changes and update GitInfo #13607
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update GitInfo.txt for net8 release p2 #13680
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

  • Replace Shell sans-serif-medium magic string on Android #13544

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Boolean filter fails on JSON column due to invalid SQL syntax #30399
  • Add column name to the error message #30397
  • "System.ArgumentException : An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Param_0" - when I try to run query second and subsequent times #30396
  • Is there a built-in way to holistically update a disconnected object graph? #30393

Closed

  • Multiple left joins results in error #30337
  • ValidateBoolsWithDefaults should take bool? backing fields into account #28509
    8.0.0
  • Appropriate use of casting when configuring mapping of interfaces and entities #30390
  • System.InvalidOperationException: No coercion operator is defined between types 'System.DateTime' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]'. #30327

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow set operations for columns that map to same store type #30400
  • Convert when using comparer for non-nullable dependent #30398
  • [release/7.0] Handle entity paths with no tables in model differ #30394
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Don't warn in model validation when bool property with default value has nullable backing field #30395
  • Port simple relationship scenarios from docs samples #30365
  • Handle entity paths with no tables in model differ #30347

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Preview 3 tarball package contains two NETCore.App shared runtimes #15698

Closed

  • Optional workloads do not work in .NET 8 builds #15348

PullRequests

Created

  • Add modular options to SB prep scripts #15697

Merged

  • Remove obsolete roslyn patch #15700
  • Fix tarball extraction when using wildcards #15695
  • Update poison usage baseline. #15688
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15692

Updated

  • Add ImportWindowsDesktopTargets=false in source-build #15689
  • [main] Add CI for building with previously source-built SDK #15603
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Refactor the MSFT SDK content comparison tests into a separate pipeline #15686
